story_21_51000/2401_1001_0100_10:
...And then supposedly this suuuper strong Trainer
named Cynthia rolled in and defeated pretty much
all of Team Break!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_0200_10: Long story short: the hideout I found was a dud.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Same here... Those wretched Team Break thugs!
Where’d they manage to hide it?!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Anyways...are you sure it was a good idea to
ditch the opening ceremony so you could keep
searchin’, Master Lear?
story_21_51000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I had no choice! If our...secret friend...falls into
the wrong hands, the PML will be the least of
our worries.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Besides, if I’d been there, all that sappy talk of
bonds and friendship would have made me gag.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_0800_10:
No! Never you mind! And where in the world is
Sawyer, anyway? He should have been here
by now!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Mmm... I’m sure he’ll thunder into this cave
any minute now.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You had better be! Those goons could be
summoning all sorts of terrible Pokémon as
we speak! Do NOT keep me waiting again!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_1200_10: Let’s go! We’ve got to head to the next hideout!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_1300_10:
It’s time to take Hoopa back from those
Team Break thieves... We cannot let them
get away with this!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_1400_10: Hoopa... You mean the Mythical Pokémon?
story_21_51000/2401_1001_1500_10:
You there! Whoever you are—come out and
show yourself!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Ah, I guess I should apologize for eavesdropping.
I never thought I’d hear the name of that
Pokémon, though.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_1800_10:
His name’s Cheren. He’s one of
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s teammates.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_1900_10: Yes, I’m aware. What is he doing here?
story_21_51000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Well, I know I’m in the wrong here, but when I
noticed you weren’t at the opening ceremony,
I got curious and followed Sawyer.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_2200_10:
I guess we’re all in way more trouble than I
originally thought.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Hoopa, the Mythical Pokémon, huh?
I’ve only ever read about it in books.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_2400_10:
It’s said that Hoopa can warp space with its
rings, sending anything and everything to
faraway places.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_2500_10:
I suppose with that kind of power, it could easily
teleport people and Pokémon to Pasio from all
over the world.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_2600_10: Tsk! You think you know everything, don’t you?
story_21_51000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Well, when you bring Hoopa into the equation,
all of the strange things going on around here
start to make sense.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Some Trainers came to this island on a ferry
or on the back of their Pokémon...
story_21_51000/2401_1001_2900_10:
but some were transported here by some
mysterious ring—me being one of them.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_3000_10:
It all makes sense now... It was Hoopa’s power
that brought us here.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_3100_10:
You used Hoopa to bring all of us sync pairs
here to Pasio, didn’t you? For the PML.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Uhhh, so what if we did? You tryin’ to accuse us
of some kinda crime?
story_21_51000/2401_1001_3300_10:
For your information, Hoopa was totally happy to
do it for us when we gave it donuts. It’s, like,
mutually beneficial or whatever.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_3400_10:
That’s right. And we sent people back home if
they didn’t want to stay on Pasio, all right?
story_21_51000/2401_1001_3500_10:
All we wanted to do was use Hoopa’s powers
to ramp up the excitement around here for
the tournament!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_3600_10: Silence! I told you not to bring that up!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_3700_10:
Whatever. I don’t have to stand here and listen to
this twerp! Rachel, Sawyer, we’re done here!
Come on!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_3800_10:
Wait, Lear! If Team Break really did steal Hoopa,
all of Pasio could be in danger now.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_3900_10:
You don’t actually think you can solve this all on
your own, do you? You need to enlist help from
the other sync pairs on the island.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_4100_10:
How dare you! Just because of what happened
in that last battle, you DARE insinuate that I
am weak?!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_4200_10:
That was a fluke! A FLUKE, I tell you!
I have no need for help—I have more than
enough strength to handle this alone!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_4300_10:
The last time I checked, I was the one in charge
here. Everyone else can simply shut their mouth
and do as I say!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_4500_10:
I am in line to become king, and what a king
says is absolute! No one is above a king!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_4600_10:
OK, let’s say you become king all on your own,
without any help from anyone... Then what?
story_21_51000/2401_1001_4700_10:
Do you think I’m a fool? What does it matter what
I would or wouldn’t do? If I don’t become king,
I’ll never gain recognition.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_4800_10: If I can’t become king, then why am I even here?!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_5200_10:
Hmph! It’s as if you all live to infuriate me!
Rachel, Sawyer, we’re leaving! Do NOT make
me say it again!
story_21_51000/2401_1001_5400_10:
Lear is bound and determined to do this all on
his own, isn’t he?
story_21_51000/2401_1001_5500_10:
That obsession with power...
He’s definitely not going to make this easy for us.
story_21_51000/2401_1001_5600_10: I wonder if this is how Alder felt...
